headline: Why CVS Health (CVS) Stock Is Falling Today
summary: Shares of diversified healthcare company CVS Health (NYSE:CVS) fell 4.8% in the afternoon session after two Republican congressmen launched an investigation into the company over concerns it may have violated the HIPAA privacy law.

raw.headline: Why CVS Health (CVS) Stock Is Falling Today

headline: SpaceX & EchoStar $17B deal, PubMatic sues Google, CVS down
summary: Yahoo Finance's John Hyland outlines three of the top stories on Wall Street in just 60 seconds, including SpaceX (SPAX.PVT) and EchoStar's (SATS) deal, PubMatic's (PUBM) lawsuit against Alphabet's Google (GOOG, GOOGL), and CVS's (CVS) stock falling. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Barclays Lifts PT on UnitedHealth Group (UNH) Stock
summary: UnitedHealth Group Incorporated (NYSE:UNH) is one of the Best Reddit Stocks to Invest in Now. headline: House Republicans probe CVS for alleged HIPAA violation
summary: In June, CVS sent a mass text to pharmacy customers in Louisiana urging them to contact their representatives to oppose a PBM reform bill. That may have been illegal, two Republican congressmen say.

raw.headline: House Republicans probe CVS for alleged HIPAA violation
